title: Parachute Jumping Procedure Training: Simulation-Based Educational Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic aviation safety knowledge and physical coordination abilities
context.additional_context: A blended learning program for undergraduate students targeting military/aviation careers, fostering systematic understanding and application of parachute descent procedures through integrated theory and practice

learning_goals: Learners can explain safety procedures and equipment usage for parachute jumps with over 80% accuracy.
Learners will successfully perform appropriate decision-making and response procedures in emergency situations at least three times through simulation training.
Learners will collaborate with team members to establish and execute role distribution and communication strategies during parachute descent.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
